Package org.xmlcml.cml.converters

Base class for converters contains many abstract classes and components

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Aggregator Classes that implement this interface aggregate several XML files based on a List of XPath query Strings.
Converter A general contract for a converter between different types.
MergeDiff Classes that implement this interface aggregate several XML files based on a List of XPath query Strings.
Splitter Deprecated.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAggregator a base-level class for converters providing aggregation Aggregator uses XPath to identify documents and parts of documents (i.e.
AbstractCommon common data and functions for converters based on dictionaries provides dictionaries, namespaces and prefixes
AbstractConverter Plumbing and IO wrangling for Converter classes - allows converter implementations to implement a single conversion method between the native object types of the data types on input and output.
AbstractIndexer An AbstractConverter that aggragates several files to create indexes.
AbstractMerger  
AbstractSplitter  
CMLMerger  
ConverterList  
ConverterLog A class that helps to write logs for the AbstractConverters.
DummyConverter dummy class for testing allows instantiation of a converter
FrameworkTest  
Index an index for CMLObjects normally uses a key already in a CMLElement
IndexEntry an index for CMLObjects normally uses a key already in a CMLElement
JumboParameter supports commandline parameters a class can prompt for its parameters on the commandline
Outputter  
TransformConverter this class takes XML input
Type  
TypeTest  
Util  
XML2XMLConverter Abstract class for all XML 2 XML convdersions (including CML)
XPathAggregator aggregates CML files using XPath (not quite sure what the difference from indexer is, indexer returns filenames...) typical result:
pyridone I
XPathIndexer applies an xpath expression to index files returns XML document with elements for those files which fulfil index.
 

Enum Summary
Index.Type  
Outputter.OutputLevel  
Type.ObjectType Enumeration of object types that are passed between converters.
